price: (62) And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walā yaṣuddannakumu al-shayṭānu innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
